review: So glad we made the purchase for the Fire TV Stick, we are enjoying very much.
author: Porch Kitty

review: Gave as gift....my son-in-law loves it!
author: Mary P Murray "mpm4bama"

review: Love the Amazon Fire TV Stick.  Set up in less than 5 minutes!  Great variety of movies and shows to choose from.  Well worth it!
author: Stephanie Baldi

review: Waste of time and money. Worked fine the first time, second time, not. would lock up while " validating pin". Restarts accomplished nothing. Support was unable to help, said send it back and we'll send you another. Said no thanks, I wil just send it back, enough time wasted on this thing....
author: krm

review: Love it!  I am able to share all the videos on my Kindle with friends and family members on our television!  It was easy to install and I have access to thousands of free videos with my Amazon Prime membership!!!!
author: Reba

review: Gr8 product very fast and user friendly. I have a smart TV blue ray players all get the job done but not as fast. clearly the current leader...
author: speedy shopper

review: It is what I hoped it would be
author: Jeffery Akers

review: I have this and the Chromecast. The Chromecast is better
author: t bird

review: Doesn't connect in pass thru mode to my receiver. Every other device on the planet will connect in pass thru mode why not this one?
author: James C. Higgins "jchiggi"

review: So sorry we didn't get it sooner.  Great to watch on the big screen
author: Lynn Cohen
